generated_caption: In 2019 , the number of digital ad fraud attacks increased by 32 percent compared to 2018 . In that year , there were a total of 40,849 detected digital advertising fraud incidents .

This statistic depicts how much money consumers spent on the purchase of a smart speaker in the past year in the United States in 2016 and a forecast for 2021 . In 2016 , the average amount spent on a smart speaker was around 180 U.S. dollars .
This statistic shows the total amount of foreign direct investment ( FDI ) for the Netherlands from 2010 to 2019 . It shows that in 2019 , total FDI reached roughly 140.24 billion U.S. dollars .

In Sweden , the number of women who were divorced in 2020 increased with age . In 2020 , 5,190 divorced women were between the ages 30 to 34 years . In the same year , 20,440 divorced men were in the same age category .

This statistic displays the results of a survey asking adults in Great Britain how effective they thought government regulation was to stop the abuse of children online in April 2015 . Only 3 percent of respondents felt that the government regulation was very effective .
This statistic shows the median household income of the residents of the U.S. state of Vermont from 1990 to 2018 . In 2018 , the median household income in Vermont was 57,433 U.S. dollars .

The statistic depicts the distribution of the global coal consumption in 2019 , by region . In 2019 , Asia accounted for approximately 74 percent of the global coal consumption , with the largest producer being China , followed by India and Japan .
This statistic shows the opinion of consumers in Great Britain concerning online retail in 2013 . 64 percent of respondents stated that they had shopped online in 2013 .

This statistic displays the export price index of solar panels and modules in Europe as of the second quarter of 2018 . The export price index for solar panels and modules was 114.5 that year , indicating a rise in export prices over the time period .
This statistic depicts the number of mobile solar PV projects installed in Italy in 2017 . There were a total of 125 mobile solar PV projects installed in 2017 , down from 156 the previous year .

This statistic presents the results of a survey conducted in March 2014 on the use of the mobile internet in Great Britain . During the survey , it was found that 22 percent of British internet users had used the mobile internet in the 48 hours prior to the survey to find a new job or to update their CV .

This statistic presents information on the most popular online travel sites worldwide in 2013 . During that year , Expedia was the most popular travel site globally , with 29 percent of respondents saying that they had booked travel on the Expedia brand .

This statistic shows the average time spent by publishers in researching and buying digital media in 2008 , 2014 and 2015 . In 2015 , the average amount of time spent by publishers in researching and buying digital media in the United Kingdom was 6.7 hours .

The most common cause of death among those infected with COVID-19 in Poland as of March 27 , 2021 was pneumonia . As of that date , a total of 244 people had died in the country due to COVID-19 infections .
The statistic shows the infant mortality rate in Iran from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , the number of infant deaths per 1,000 live births in Iran was 16.1 .

This statistic shows the direct value addition by tourism in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2012 to 2014 . In 2014 , tourism added a direct value of 99 billion British pounds to the economy of the United Kingdom . This was an increase of over 11 billion British pounds from the previous year .

The average age of the population of Austria has been increasing over the past years , and in 2020 it was estimated at 44.7 years . The highest average age is found in the age group of more than 75 years . The lowest average is measured for the age group of less than one year .
This graph displays the number of employees of Icelandair from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , the airline employd 1,530 people . The company generated a revenue of roughly 1.6 billion euros in 2019 .
This statistic shows the distribution of domestic tourism expenditure by type of trip in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2018 . 44 percent of domestic tourism expenditure was spent on day trips .

This statistic shows the share of adults who had used the internet to find information on financial and money management in the United States as of September 2018 . During the survey , it was found that 83 percent of internet users had looked for financial and money management information on the web .

This statistic displays the share of business leaders ' opinion on whether the United Kingdom 's ( UK ) departure from the European Union will impact their business in the UK . 60 percent of respondents believe that the UK 's departure from the EU will negatively impact their business in the UK .

This statistic shows the results of a 2016 survey among Google DoubleClick clients regarding the importance of Google DoubleClick as an ad tech partner . During the survey period , 66 percent of respondents said that Google DoubleClick was either '' extremely important '' or '' very important '' to their businesses .

This statistic shows the total value of shipments of women 's and girls ' clothing and footwear stores in Canada from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 , the shipment value of women 's and girls ' clothing and footwear stores in Canada amounted to approximately 6.4 billion Canadian dollars .

This statistic shows the annual personnel costs of the textile manufacturing sector in Croatia from 2008 to 2015 . In 2015 , personnel costs in the textile manufacturing sector amounted to 102.6 million euros .

This statistic shows the share of the global adult population by the frequency of engaging in physical activity , as of 2019 . During this year , 28 percent of the world 's adult population were found to be engaged in vigorous physical activity less than once per week .

This statistic shows the annual turnover of the rental and leasing activities industry in Estonia from 2008 to 2017 . In 2017 , the rental and leasing activities industry produced a turnover of approximately 226 million euros .

The timeline gives information on the share of consumers who use the social network the `` The Guardian '' in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 3rd quarter 2011 to 2nd quarter 2019 , by age . From 2011 to 2014 , the percentage of individuals of all ages who use The Guardian 's social network remained stable at around 5 percent . In the second quarter of 2019 , the daily published a 3 percent share of 18 to 24 year-old individuals .
This statistic displays the population growth in Togo from 2010 to 2020 . In 2020 , Togo 's population increased by approximately 2.66 percent compared to the previous year .

This statistic presents the natural gas prices in selected countries , including the price paid by households , industry and power generation sector from 2008 to 2018 . In 2018 , the gas price for households was around 2.3 British pounds per thousand cubic meters . The price for industry was 5.8 British pounds per thousand cubic meters .

This statistic shows data on the most used substances to treat opioid addiction in the United States as of January 2020 . During the survey , it was found that nearly 45 percent of people used methadone for treatment , while 23.5 percent of people used buprenorphine/buprenorphine-naloxone combination .

This statistic shows the total number of employees in the information and communication technology services sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2008 to 2015 . In 2014 , the ICT services sector employed a total number of 1.11 million people .

This statistic depicts the share of respondents who were aware of the existence of a Pension Protection Fund ( PPF ) in the United Kingdom ( UK ) , in 2014 . According to the survey , the share of respondents who knew about the existence of the fund was 62 percent .

This statistic shows the average annual electricity consumption of households in France as of 2015 , by type of equipment ( in kilowatt hours per year ) . It shows that households with washing machines consumed more than double the electricity than those without washing machines , with 1,670 and 750 kilowatt hours per year , respectively .

The graph shows the sales of the leading gin brand in Great Britain ( UK ) in the first quarter of 2013 . The sales of Gordon 's London Dry Gin increased from 1.48 million liters in the first quarter of 2012 to 1.92 million liters in the first quarter of 2013 .

This statistic illustrates the share of consumers who are interested in buying products with a sustainability or ethical label in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2017 . Consumers aged between 16 and 24 years old showed the most interest in buying sustainably labelled products at 82 percent .

The statistic shows Converse 's revenue by region from the fiscal years 2010 to 2018 . In the 2018 fiscal year , Converse 's revenue from the Asia/Pacific region amounted to about 425.7 million U.S. dollars .

In 2020 , the volume of coal produced in the Czech Republic was expected to decrease by 13.8 million tons compared to the previous year . Coal is a fossil fuel , meaning that it is formed by the decomposition of ancient plants and animals that were buried underneath the soil . Coal is used as a fuel for electricity generation , heating , and industrial processes .

In 2020 , around 350,000 people in the United States received a kidney transplant , and about 150,000 people died waiting for a kidney transplant . This statistic shows the estimated number of kidney transplants and deaths while waiting for a transplant in the United States from 2008 to 2020 .

The price per hectolitre of beer sold in bars and restaurants in Spain has decreased overall over the past decade . In 2020 , the price per hectoliter of beer sold in bars and restaurants amounted to 0.7 euros , a decrease of 46.2 percent in comparison with the 2008 value of 1.4 euros .

This statistic shows the annual personnel costs of the printing and reproduction of recorded media sector in Croatia from 2008 to 2016 . In 2016 , the printing and reproduction of recorded media sector produced approximately 32.3 million euros of personnel costs .
This statistic displays the volume of beer consumed per capita in the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2012 and 2014 . The volume of beer consumed per capita was approximately 21 liters in 2014 .

The COVID-19 impact on the U.S. retail sector was felt in several areas , with many companies closing or scaling back . In the first half of 2020 , 42 percent of U.S. retailers stated they would have to make cutbacks in staffing due to the coronavirus pandemic , while 39 percent reported having to cut back on inventories as a result .

This statistic displays how often adults in Canada used public internet access to look at or post information or comments on a social networking web site in 2013 . In 2013 , 43 percent of Canadians reported they used a public internet access to look at or post information or comments on a social networking web site in the past month .
The statistic shows the world 's richest countries in 2020 , by net international debt . In 2020 , the net international debt of Iceland amounted to about 358.12 billion U.S. dollars .

This statistic shows the results of a 2014 survey among U.S. adults on their views on the impact of health information websites on their health care decisions . According to the survey , 64 percent of respondents agreed or strongly agreed that health information websites had a great impact on their health care decisions .

This statistic shows the leading 15 states with the highest percentage of female-headed households in the United States in 2018 . In that year , 28.5 percent of all households in the District of Columbia were led by female householder .
